soundPowerSaveOnAc.name: SoundPowerSaveOnAc
soundPowerSaveOnAc.name[zh_CN]: 连接电源状态的音频节能模式
soundPowerSaveOnAc.description: Audio power saving for Intel HDA on Alternating current.

soundPowerSaveOnBat.name: SoundPowerSaveOnBat
soundPowerSaveOnBat.name[zh_CN]: 电池状态的音频节能模式
soundPowerSaveOnBat.description: Audio power saving for Intel HDA on battery.

startChargeThreshBatPrimary.name: StartChargeThreshBatPrimary
startChargeThreshBatPrimary.name[zh_CN]: 主电池开始充电的阈值
startChargeThreshBatPrimary.description: Main Battery charge level below which charging will begin when connecting the charger.

stopChargeThreshBatPrimary.name: StopChargeThreshBatPrimary
stopChargeThreshBatPrimary.name[zh_CN]: 主电池停止充电的阈值
stopChargeThreshBatPrimary.description: Main battery charge level above which charging will stop while the charger is connected.

startChargeThreshBatSecondary.name: StartChargeThreshBatSecondary
startChargeThreshBatSecondary.name[zh_CN]: 辅电池开始充电的阈值
startChargeThreshBatSecondary.description: Ultrabay battery charge level below which charging will begin when connecting the charger.

stopChargeThreshBatSecondary.name: StopChargeThreshBatSecondary
stopChargeThreshBatSecondary.name[zh_CN]: 辅电池停止充电的阈值
stopChargeThreshBatSecondary.description: Ultrabay battery charge level above which charging will stop while the charger is connected.

restoreThresholdsOnBat.name: RestoreThresholdsOnBat
restoreThresholdsOnBat.description: Restore configured charge thresholds when AC is unplugged.

bayPoweroffOnAc.name: BayPoweroffOnAc
bayPoweroffOnAc.description: Power off optical drive in UltraBay/MediaBay

bayPoweroffOnBat.name: BayPoweroffOnBat
bayPoweroffOnBat.description: Power off optical drive in UltraBay/MediaBay

bayDevice.name: BayDevice
bayDevice.description: Optical drive device to power off

maxLostWorkSecsOnAc.name: MaxLostWorkSecsOnAc
maxLostWorkSecsOnAc.name[zh_CN]: 接入电源磁盘写入超时
maxLostWorkSecsOnAc.description: Timeout (in seconds) for writing unsaved data in file system buffers to disk

maxLostWorkSecsOnBat.name: MaxLostWorkSecsOnBat
maxLostWorkSecsOnBat.name[zh_CN]: 接入电池磁盘写入超时
maxLostWorkSecsOnBat.description: Timeout (in seconds) for writing unsaved data in file system buffers to disk

wifiPwrOnAc.name: WifiPwrOnAc
wifiPwrOnAc.description: Sets Wi-Fi power saving mode. Adapter support depends on kernel and driver.

wifiPwrOnBat.name: WifiPwrOnBat
wifiPwrOnBat.description: Sets Wi-Fi power saving mode. Adapter support depends on kernel and driver.

restoreDeviceStateOnStartup.name: RestoreDeviceStateOnStartup
restoreDeviceStateOnStartup.description: Restores radio device state (builtin Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, WWAN) from previous shutdown on boot

devicesToDisableOnStartup.name: DevicesToDisableOnStartup
devicesToDisableOnStartup.name[zh_CN]: 启动时禁用内置无线设备
devicesToDisableOnStartup.description: Disables builtin radio devices on boot

devicesToEableOnStartup.name: DevicesToEableOnStartup
devicesToEableOnStartup.name[zh_CN]: 启动时启用内置无线设备
devicesToEableOnStartup.description: Radio devices to enable on startup

devicesToDisableOnShutdown.name: DevicesToDisableOnShutdown
devicesToDisableOnShutdown.name[zh_CN]: 关机时禁用内置无线设备
devicesToDisableOnShutdown.description: Disables builtin radio devices upon system shutdown.

devicesToEableOnShutdown.name: DevicesToEableOnShutdown
devicesToEableOnShutdown.name[zh_CN]: 关机时启用内置无线设备
devicesToEableOnShutdown.description: Enables builtin radio devices on shutdown

devicesToEableOnAc.name: DevicesToEableOnAc
devicesToEableOnAc.name[zh_CN]: 接入电源时启用内置无线设备
devicesToEableOnAc.description: Enables builtin radio devices when AC power is plugged in.

devicesToDisableOnBat.name: DevicesToDisableOnBat
devicesToDisableOnBat.name[zh_CN]: 接入电池时禁用内置无线设备
devicesToDisableOnBat.description: Disables builtin radio devices when changing to battery power regardless of their connection state

devicesToDisableOnBatNotInUse.name: DevicesToDisableOnBatNotInUse
devicesToDisableOnBatNotInUse.name[zh_CN]: 当设备没有连接时，接入电源禁用内置无线设备
devicesToDisableOnBatNotInUse.description: Disables builtin radio devices that are not connected when changing to battery power

devicesToDisableOnLanConnect.name: DevicesToDisableOnLanConnect
devicesToDisableOnLanConnect.name[zh_CN]: LAN建立连接后，禁用无线设备
devicesToDisableOnLanConnect.description: When a LAN connection has been established, the stated radio devices are disabled

devicesToDisableOnWifiConnect.name: DevicesToDisableOnWifiConnect
devicesToDisableOnWifiConnect.name[zh_CN]: Wifi建立连接后，禁用无线设备
devicesToDisableOnWifiConnect.description: When a Wifi connection has been established, the stated radio devices are disabled

devicesToDisableOnWwanConnect.name: DevicesToDisableOnWwanConnect
devicesToDisableOnWwanConnect.name[zh_CN]: Wwan建立连接后，禁用无线设备
devicesToDisableOnWwanConnect.description: When a Wwan connection has been established, the stated radio devices are disabled

devicesToEableOnLanDisconnect.name: DevicesToEableOnLanDisconnect
devicesToEableOnLanDisconnect.description: When a LAN connection has been disconnected, the stated radio devices are enabled

devicesToEableOnWifiDisconnect.name: DevicesToEableOnWifiDisconnect
devicesToEableOnWifiDisconnect.description: When a wifi connection has been disconnected, the stated radio devices are enabled

devicesToEableOnWwanDisconnect.name: DevicesToEableOnWwanDisconnect
devicesToEableOnWwanDisconnect.description: When a Wwan connection has been disconnected, the stated radio devices are enabled

devicesToEableOnDock.name: DevicesToEableOnDock
devicesToEableOnDock.name[zh_CN]: 停靠后，无线设备被启用
devicesToEableOnDock.description: After docking the stated radio devices are enabled.

devicesToDisableOnDock.name: DevicesToDisableOnDock
devicesToDisableOnDock.name[zh_CN]: 停靠后，无线设备被禁用
devicesToDisableOnDock.description: After docking the stated radio devices are disabled.

devicesToEableOnUndock.name: DevicesToEableOnUndock
devicesToEableOnUndock.name[zh_CN]: 解除对接后，启用无线设备
devicesToEableOnUndock.description: After undocking the stated radio devices are enabled.

devicesToDisableOnUndock.name: DevicesToDisableOnUndock
devicesToDisableOnUndock.name[zh_CN]: 解除对接后，禁用无线设备
devicesToDisableOnUndock.description: After undocking the stated radio devices are disabled.

runtimePmOnAc.name: RuntimePmOnAc
runtimePmOnAc.name[zh_CN]: PCIe 设备的运行时电源管理
runtimePmOnAc.description: Controls runtime power management for PCIe devices.

runtimePmOnBat.name: RuntimePmOnBat
runtimePmOnBat.name[zh_CN]: PCIe 设备的运行时电源管理
runtimePmOnBat.description: Controls runtime power management for PCIe devices.

pcieAspmOnAc.name: PcieAspmOnAc
pcieAspmOnAc.name[zh_CN]: 设置 PCIe ASPM 节能模式
pcieAspmOnAc.description: Sets PCIe ASPM power saving mode.

pcieAspmOnBat.name: PcieAspmOnBat
pcieAspmOnBat.name[zh_CN]: 设置 PCIe ASPM 节能模式
pcieAspmOnBat.description: Sets PCIe ASPM power saving mode.

usbAutosuspend.name: UsbAutosuspend
usbAutosuspend.description: Set autosuspend mode for USB devices on boot and when plugged.

usbAutosuspendDisableOnShutdown.name: UsbAutosuspendDisableOnShutdown
usbAutosuspendDisableOnShutdown.name[zh_CN]: 系统关闭时禁用USB自动挂起
usbAutosuspendDisableOnShutdown.description: Disables USB autosuspend mode upon system shutdown.

diskApmLevelOnAc.name: DiskApmLevelOnAc
diskApmLevelOnAc.name[zh_CN]: 接入电源时磁盘功耗的管理

diskApmLevelOnBat.name: DiskApmLevelOnBat
diskApmLevelOnBat.name[zh_CN]: 接入电池时磁盘功耗的管理

sataLinkPwrOnAc.name[zh_CN]: 为连接磁盘和光驱的 SATA 链路设置电源管理模式
sataLinkPwrOnAc.description: Sets the power management mode for the SATA links connecting disks and optical drives

sataLinkPwrOnBat.name: SataLinkPwrOnBat
sataLinkPwrOnBat.name[zh_CN]: 为连接磁盘和光驱的 SATA 链路设置电源管理模式
sataLinkPwrOnBat.description: Sets the power management mode for the SATA links connecting disks and optical drives
